name: Pooches Outa Control
description:
My submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020!

My first jam and first "completed" game so please be gentle!

Theme: Out of Control - Taking some out of control dogs on a very embarrassing walk.

One of the minigames has no instructions so here we go: Press SPACE to stop the icon.

Note: Thanks so much to my girlfriend 宛霖 for the background art and squirrel! <3
